bike.description: Triple-butted 6061 SuperPlastic Formed (SPF) aluminum, 1.5 - 1 1/8" tapered head tube, over-sized seat tube, crown-clearing down tube, over-sized stays with post mount disc brakes, replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: RST Blaze 650B TNL, MCU/coil spring with Turn-n-Lock lock-out and external preload adjustor, 30mm stanchions, 100mm travel
FSA Orbit 1.5 Zero-Stack internal cup, 30mm shim stack
Alex MD19 650B double-wall disc-specific rims, Formula alloy 6-bolt disc hubs, 14g black stainless steel spokes
Shimano Alivio M410 rear, Shimano M190 front
Shimano M311, alloy crank arms, 42/32/22T rings, 170mm (15") 175mm (17-21")
ATB platform, hi-impact resin cage & body
Tektro HDC-300 hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm rotors
Jamis XC alloy riser, 31.8 x 8JAMIS_DEGREE x 25mm rise x 680mm
Jamis XC alloy threadless, 7JAMIS_DEGREE rise x 90mm (15"), 100mm (17"), 110mm (19"), 120mm (21")
Jamis ATB Comp with pressure relief channel
